Table 7.   Police protection sworn and nonsworn employment and payrolls and percent
distribution of full-time equivalent employment by State and level of government, March 1997
Notes: March payroll data may not add to total due to rounding.  For the same reason these data may not sum to
equal police protection March payrolls on table 6.  Local government data are estimates subject to variability.
